item.title: From Idea to PyPI — How I Built and Published My Own Python SDK
item.description: Learn step-by-step how to create, test, and publish your own Python SDK to PyPI using the OpenWeather API as an example.

item.title: Python Lists vs Tuples vs Sets — When to Use Each
item.description: Practical differences between Python's list, tuple, and set types — and when each one makes sense in production code.

item.title: Hello World from DailyPyTips
item.description: Welcome to DailyPyTips — Python, Flask/FastAPI, AWS, SQL, and more.
